title: Optus Wifi getting disconnected
body:
Hi guys, 
So recently I keep having a problems with my internet where the Optus internet keep making me having attempt to reconnect while the wifi is perfectly good and other devices in my house can use the internet pretty quick too. So is this due to my Pc or the Optus internet being bad or is it my pc as I use the wifi instead of lan

replies.body: same man its only happened suddenly its pissing me off

I'm on high quality fiber net (in NZ) and frequently have issues with LoL when my net is working perfectly.
It's trash servers bro, not your net.
